description: Improve community practices to meet OSS best practices

tasks.name: Create bug report issue template
steps: Create .github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/bug_report.yml
Include sections: description, reproduction, expected, environment
Add version information field
Add labels: bug, needs-triage
Test template by creating a test issue

tasks.name: Create feature request issue template
steps: Create .github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/feature_request.yml
Include sections: problem, solution, alternatives, context
Add labels: enhancement, needs-triage
Test template

tasks.name: Create pull request template
steps: Create .github/PULL_REQUEST_TEMPLATE.md
Include sections: summary, changes, testing, checklist
Add checklist items: tests, docs, conventional commit
Reference issue linking

tasks.name: Create CODEOWNERS file
steps: Create .github/CODEOWNERS
Add default owner for all files
Add specific owners for key areas (docs, CI, etc.)
Test with a sample PR

tasks.name: Enable GitHub Discussions
steps: Enable Discussions in repository settings
Set up categories: Q&A, Ideas, Show and Tell, General
Add link to Discussions in README
Create welcome discussion or pinned post

tasks.name: Set up consistent label system
steps: Create standard labels: bug, enhancement, documentation
Add priority labels: priority-high, priority-medium, priority-low
Add status labels: needs-triage, in-progress, blocked
Add area labels: cli, config, merge, phases
Add good first issue and help wanted labels

tasks.name: Identify and tag good first issues
steps: Review existing issues for beginner-friendly work
Create new issues for easy improvements
Add good first issue label
Add clear context and guidance in issue description
Mention good first issues in CONTRIBUTING.md
acceptance_criteria: At least 3 issues labeled good first issue

tasks.name: Create issue template config
steps: Create .github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/config.yml
Add links to Discussions for questions
Add blank issue option for other reports
Configure contact links

notes: Issue templates improve bug report quality
PR templates ensure consistent contribution process
Good first issues help onboard new contributors
